integration_patterns: Batch processing using AWS Step Functions

evidence.claim: FinicHealth utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure including Lambda and S3 services.
FinicHealth supports FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
The company mentions X12 standards in their healthcare transaction services.
Integration with EHR systems is highlighted in their API documentation.
Event-driven architecture is part of their integration strategy for processing health data.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of actively sending/receiving X12 transactions or value API automation for healthcare.
